attributes.action: Legalise cannabis in the UK for medical use. Your vote can help save lives.
attributes.background: Legalise cannabis in the UK to allow the NHS to use it for treatment. For years people have argued wether it should be legal or not but yet statistics show 19% of the UK smoke cigarettes and 15% of cancer is caused by them. There is only 1 way to find out if this can cure everything it says it can.
